body_html: @jdduke Is there an integration example with Linux c++? We have only model inference in a mobile app. What it is suggested for a standalone app on a linux host? XLA AOT? Tensorflow standard with c++ api?
body_text: @jdduke Is there an integration example with Linux c++? We have only model inference in a mobile app. What it is suggested for a standalone app on a linux host? XLA AOT? Tensorflow standard with c++ api?
body: @jdduke Is there an integration example with Linux c++? We have [only model inference in a mobile app](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/lite/g3doc/devguide.md#3-use-the-tensorflow-lite-model-for-inference-in-a-mobile-app). What it is suggested for a standalone app on a linux host? XLA AOT? Tensorflow standard with c++ api?
